reviewtext: There are still those of us who use our VCR's instead of Tivo for simple recording because of the monthly cost.  VCR tapes are all but impossible to find locally so I was thrilled to find good quality tapes here at a decent price.  So far, they have produced good quality recordings and I have been able to reuse them without issue.  I plan to stock up on more very soon!
summary: Good quality VCR tapes at a good price!
